message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM

This paper deals with language-and-vision tasks such as image-text matching and image captioning, which are typically studied in the computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL) communities. The paper proposes the use of neural scene graph generators to learn effective visual relation features, which involves training deep learning models (cs.AI) and optimizing their performance (cs.LG). Finally, the paper evaluates its approach on standard benchmarks in the multimedia (cs.MM) domain.
